data.eml:eml: Reassessment of the Jurassic damsel-dragonfly genus Karatawia (Odonata: Campterophlebiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Yong-Jun, Nel, André, Ren, Dong, Zhang, Bing-Lan, Pang, Hong (2012): Reassessment of the Jurassic damsel-dragonfly genus Karatawia (Odonata: Campterophlebiidae). Zootaxa 3417: 64-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281965
